breakdowns.description: Create, Read, Update, and Delete tasks.
conditions: Each task must have a Unique ID
Each task must have a Title
Each task must have a Description
Each task must have a Status: To Do, In Progress, Done
Each task must have a Due Date
Each task must have a Priority
Each user must have a Unique ID
Each user must have a Name
Each user must have an Email
Each user must have a Role

breakdowns.description: Assign one or more users to a task and reassign users without deleting the task.
conditions: Assign one or more users to a task
Reassigning updates the task’s assignees without deleting the task

breakdowns.description: Provide a main program with CLI arguments to perform all operations above.
conditions: Main program must accept CLI arguments to perform all operations described above
